resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108394</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108394</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200601</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Balloons & Buoyancy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ballone U. Tragvermögen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ballons et Flottabilité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Balões & Buoyancy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aerostati & Galleggiabilità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μπαλόνια & πλευστότητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Globos Y Flotabilidad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Experiment with a helium balloon, a hot air balloon, or a rigid sphere filled with different gases. Discover what makes some balloons float and others sink.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experimentieren Sie mit einem Heliumballon, einem 
Heißluftballon oder einem steifen Bereich, der mit unterschiedlichen 
Gasen gefüllt wird. Entdecken Sie, daß was einige Ballone 
schwimmen läßt und andere sinken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérimentez avec un ballon d'hélium, un ballon 
à air chaud, ou une sphère rigide remplie avec différents gaz. 
Découvrez que ce qui fait quelques ballons flotter et d'autres 
descendent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experimente com um balão do helium, um balão de 
ar quente, ou uma esfera rígida enchida com os gáses diferentes. 
Descubra que o que faz alguns balões flutuar e outro afunda-se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sperimenti con un aerostato dell'elio, un 
aerostato di aria calda, o una sfera rigida riempita con differenti 
gas. Scopra che che cosa fa alcuni aerostati galleggiare ed 
altri si affondano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πείραμα με ένα μπαλόνι ηλίου, ένα μπαλόνι καυτού
αέρα, ή μια άκαμπτη σφαίρα γέμισε με τα διαφορετικά αέρια. 
Ανακαλύψτε τι κάνει μερικά μπαλόνια να επιπλεύσουν και 
άλλων το νεροχύτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimente con un globo del helio, un globo del 
aire caliente, o una esfera rígida llenada de diversos gases. 
Descubra qué hace que algunos globos flotan y otros se hunden.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200601</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108394</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/balloons-buoyancy</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
